    • Uses of RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry

      Subinterfaces of RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  V2CompatibleBackoffStrategy
      Adapter interface for backoff strategies that can be used in both legacy RetryPolicies and the new V2 retry policy.
      Classes in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry that implement RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PredefinedBackoffStrategies.EqualJitterBackoffStrategy 
      static class  PredefinedBackoffStrategies.ExponentialBackoffStrategy 
      static class  PredefinedBackoffStrategies.FullJitterBackoffStrategy 
      Fields in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry declared as RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy PredefinedRetryPolicies.DEFAULT_BACKOFF_STRATEGY
      The SDK default back-off strategy, which increases exponentially up to a max amount of delay.
      static RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy PredefinedRetryPolicies.DYNAMODB_DEFAULT_BACKOFF_STRATEGY
      The default back-off strategy for DynamoDB client, which increases exponentially up to a max amount of delay.
      static RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy.NO_DELAY 
      Methods in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry that return RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy RetryPolicy.getBackoffStrategy()
      Returns the back-off strategy included in this retry policy.
